snippet: Mr. Fenwick, a longtime Bloomberg L.P. executive, is filling a six-month vacancy created when Les Hinton resigned amid the phone-hacking scandal in Britain.
abstract: Mr. Fenwick, a longtime Bloomberg L.P. executive, is filling a six-month vacancy created when Les Hinton resigned amid the phone-hacking scandal in Britain.

headline.main: Dow Jones Names Lex Fenwick Its New Chief Executive
